languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassins{/g} of the death cult that has formed in the depths of the von Valancius flagship are sworn to their duty of serving the Undying Emperor. Their movements in combat are akin to a dance with death, the blades in their hands are weapons of faith, the act of killing is their sacred mission, and the blood they spill and draw becomes a ritual offering to Him.
languages.original_text: Убийцы культа смерти, возникшего в недрах флагмана фон Валанциус, признают своим долгом служение Неумирающему Императору. Их движения в бою подобны танцу со смертью, клинки в их руках есть оружие веры, кровь собственная и чужая — ритуальный дар Ему, а убийство — священный долг.

traits.locale_text: The assassins of the death cult that has formed in the depths of the von Valancius flagship are sworn to their duty of serving the Undying Emperor. Their movements in combat are akin to a dance with death, the blades in their hands are weapons of faith, the blood they spill and draw is their ritual offering to Him, and the act of killing is their sacred mission.

The assassins of the death cult that has formed in the depths of the von Valancius flagship are sworn to their duty of serving the Undying Emperor. Their movements in combat are akin to a dance with death, the blades in their hands are weapons of faith, the blood they spill and draw is their ritual offering to Him, and the act of killing is their sacred mission.

Their movements in combat are akin to a dance with death, the blades in their hands are weapons of faith, the act of killing is their sacred mission, and the blood they spill and draw becomes a ritual offering to Him.

The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassins{/g} of the death cult that has formed in the depths of the von Valancius flagship are sworn to their duty of serving the Undying Emperor. Their movements in combat are akin to a dance with death, the blades in their hands are weapons of faith, the act of killing is their sacred mission, and the blood they spill and draw becomes a ritual offering to Him.

languages.text: Убийцы культа смерти, возникшего в недрах флагмана фон Валанциус, признают своим долгом служение Неумирающему Императору. Их движения в бою подобны танцу со смертью, клинки в их руках есть оружие веры, кровь собственная и чужая — ритуальный дар Ему, а убийство — священный долг.

Die {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}Assassinen{/g} des Todeskultes, der sich in den Tiefen des Flaggschiffs derer von Valancius gebildet hat, haben sich dem Todlosen Imperator verschworen. Ihre Bewegungen im Tanz gleichen einem Tanz mit dem Tod. Die Klingen in ihren Händen sind Waffen des Glaubens. Der Akt des Tötens ist eine heilige Mission und das Blut, das sie vergießen, wird Ihm in Ritualen geopfert.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassins{/g} of the death cult that has formed in the depths of the von Valancius flagship are sworn to their duty of serving the Undying Emperor. Their movements in combat are akin to a dance with death, the blades in their hands are weapons of faith, the act of killing is their sacred mission, and the blood they spill and draw becomes a ritual offering to Him.

Der Akt des Tötens ist eine heilige Mission und das Blut, das sie vergießen, wird Ihm in Ritualen geopfert.

Der Akt des Tötens ist eine heilige Mission und das Blut, das sie vergießen, wird Ihm in Ritualen geopfert.

languages.text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassins{/g} du culte de la mort qui a vu le jour dans les entrailles du vaisseau amiral des von Valancius sont liés par leur serment au service de l'Empereur Immortel. Leur style de combat s'apparente à une danse avec la mort, leurs lames sont les armes de la foi, l'art de tuer leur mission sacrée et le sang qu'ils versent une offrande rituelle en Son honneur.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassins{/g} of the death cult that has formed in the depths of the von Valancius flagship are sworn to their duty of serving the Undying Emperor. Their movements in combat are akin to a dance with death, the blades in their hands are weapons of faith, the act of killing is their sacred mission, and the blood they spill and draw becomes a ritual offering to Him.

traits.locale_text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassins{/g} du culte de la mort qui a vu le jour dans les entrailles du vaisseau amiral des von Valancius sont liés par leur serment au service de l'Empereur Immortel. Leur style de combat s'apparente à une danse avec la mort, leurs lames sont les armes de la foi, l'art de tuer leur mission sacrée et le sang qu'ils versent une offrande rituelle en Son honneur.

Les {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassins{/g} du culte de la mort qui a vu le jour dans les entrailles du vaisseau amiral des von Valancius sont liés par leur serment au service de l'Empereur Immortel. Leur style de combat s'apparente à une danse avec la mort, leurs lames sont les armes de la foi, l'art de tuer leur mission sacrée et le sang qu'ils versent une offrande rituelle en Son honneur.

languages.text: Los {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesinos{/g} del Culto de la Muerte que se ha formado en las profundidades de la nave insignia von Valancius han jurado servir al Emperador Inmortal. En combate, sus movimientos son una danza mortal. Las armas que empuñan son instrumentos de su fe, matar es una misión sagrada y la sangre que vierten y derraman es una ofrenda ritual.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassins{/g} of the death cult that has formed in the depths of the von Valancius flagship are sworn to their duty of serving the Undying Emperor. Their movements in combat are akin to a dance with death, the blades in their hands are weapons of faith, the act of killing is their sacred mission, and the blood they spill and draw becomes a ritual offering to Him.

traits.locale_text: Los {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}asesinos{/g} del Culto de la Muerte que se ha formado en las profundidades de la nave insignia von Valancius han jurado servir al Emperador Inmortal. En combate, sus movimientos son una danza mortal. Las armas que empuñan son instrumentos de su fe, matar es una misión sagrada y la sangre que vierten y derraman es una ofrenda ritual.

languages.text: フォン・ヴァランシウス旗艦の深みにて結成された死のカルトの{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}は、不死の皇帝に仕えることを誓っている。戦闘における彼らの動きは、死神とのダンスに似ている。その手にある刃物は信仰の武器であり、殺すという行為は神聖な使命であり、彼らが流し、流させる血は、神への儀式上の捧げものになる。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassins{/g} of the death cult that has formed in the depths of the von Valancius flagship are sworn to their duty of serving the Undying Emperor. Their movements in combat are akin to a dance with death, the blades in their hands are weapons of faith, the act of killing is their sacred mission, and the blood they spill and draw becomes a ritual offering to Him.

traits.locale_text: フォン・ヴァランシウス旗艦の深みにて結成された死のカルトの{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}アサシン{/g}は、不死の皇帝に仕えることを誓っている。戦闘における彼らの動きは、死神とのダンスに似ている。その手にある刃物は信仰の武器であり、殺すという行為は神聖な使命であり、彼らが流し、流させる血は、神への儀式上の捧げものになる。

languages.text: 拜死教{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}在冯·瓦兰修斯王朝旗舰深结成了教派，宣誓效忠不死神皇。他们战斗的样子就像是在死亡中翩翩起舞一样。他们的利刃是象征信仰的武器，杀戮是他们的神圣使命，而他们洒下的鲜血将会成为献给不死神皇的祭品。
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassins{/g} of the death cult that has formed in the depths of the von Valancius flagship are sworn to their duty of serving the Undying Emperor. Their movements in combat are akin to a dance with death, the blades in their hands are weapons of faith, the act of killing is their sacred mission, and the blood they spill and draw becomes a ritual offering to Him.

traits.locale_text: 拜死教{g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}刺客{/g}在冯·瓦兰修斯王朝旗舰深结成了教派，宣誓效忠不死神皇。他们战斗的样子就像是在死亡中翩翩起舞一样。他们的利刃是象征信仰的武器，杀戮是他们的神圣使命，而他们洒下的鲜血将会成为献给不死神皇的祭品。

languages.text: Von Valancius sancak gemisinin derinliklerinde kurulmuş ölüm tarikatının {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}suikastçıları{/g}, Ölmeyen İmparator'a hizmet etmeye ant içmişlerdir. Çatışmada sergiledikleri hareketler, ölümle dansa benzer. Ellerindeki bıçaklar inançlarının silahı, öldürmekse kutsal vazifeleridir. Döktükleri ve emdikleri kan, O'na adanmış bir ayine dönüşür.
languages.original_text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerAssassinGlossary}assassins{/g} of the death cult that has formed in the depths of the von Valancius flagship are sworn to their duty of serving the Undying Emperor. Their movements in combat are akin to a dance with death, the blades in their hands are weapons of faith, the act of killing is their sacred mission, and the blood they spill and draw becomes a ritual offering to Him.
